title: Battlefield Earth (2000) 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch
description:
Battlefield.Earth.2000.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

THE OPENING TEXT CRAWL IS IN GERMAN BUT ALL DIALOG IS ENGLISH
CRAWL AND TITLE TRANSLATION IS BELOW

Battlefield Earth (2000)
video: 1920x1080 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: some Psychlo dialog is hard coded
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
intro: 1s *after* the last riff comment
Rifftrax released 2007.01.28 1h59m06s 2,648,027,268bytes

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies and the subs.

If these Rifftrax were enjoyable, you haven't paid for them and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing these riffs (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too  

Battlefield Earth Opening Crawl:

It is the year 3000 A.D.

Earth, once mankind's home, has 
been ruled for the past 1000 years 
by a cruel alien race from the 
planet Psychlo.

As they have done on countless 
other planets across the galaxies, 
the Psychlos mine Earth's metals 
and teleport them back to their 
home planet.

Gold is the rarest and most valuable 
metal of all.

The dwindling human population is 
fighting to stay alive. Hiding in 
pockets, in radiated areas, they are 
on the verge of extinction.

Battlefield
